items.sentence: Unfortunately, the food supplies gave out before the end of winter.
Didn't you have a crush on Tom when you were in junior high school?
Have I ever told you guys about the first time that I went camping?
In case my last text wasn't clear enough, I'm breaking up with you.
Tom said that he was sorry that he'd hurt Mary's friend's feelings.
Tom asked his girlfriend to pardon him for forgetting her birthday.
Doing something with somebody else is more fun than doing it alone.
Tom is well-read and can talk knowledgeably about almost any topic.
Tom was shocked by the news that his father had had a heart attack.
I suspect Tom won't tell Mary the real reason he's going to Boston.
